Articles.Content: A little idea, i would want sensors so i can activate certain action groups when they detect things like distance, preassure or temperature :DDD (i'd love if this was added in both KSP and KSP2)
Welcome to the fora.  I think there's already a mod for what you want, but I've never used it:

3 hours ago, Allan9099 said:

A little idea, i would want sensors so i can activate certain action groups when they detect things like distance, preassure or temperature :DDD (i'd love if this was added in both KSP and KSP2)

Then science would be so much simpler. All for like a 2 second time save. You can hook them up to CAGs (Custom Action Groups) but no, this will not be added.

I would love to see a stock implementation of this.  SmartParts is one of my must-have mods, especially for the altimeter.  It's really handy for propulsively landing rockets in an atmosphere, since it can deploy the legs for you at a certain alt and you don't need to juggle that with trying to keep orientation and manage the throttle.
